etomica.normalmode

Class WriteS

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.normalmode.WriteS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction

    public class WriteS
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAction
    Class that writes out S from the MeterNormalMode, calculates eigenvectors/values (writes them out) and calculates the harmonic free energy from them.
